Setting â€˜telopâ€™ and â€˜logoâ€™ images which youâ€™re companyâ€™s.ïƒ

Follow the steps below.

1. Prepare a new telop and logo image for replacement.ïƒ

2. The telop and logo images are in ./images/.ïƒ

3. Replace â€˜telop.pngâ€™ and â€˜Logo.pngâ€™ images.ïƒ

4. When you start the application after replacing these images, it will be drawn in the window.ïƒ
